title: Rotation Game Mode -- Weekends only
body:
Is there any way this might become a week long instead of just weekends?

Or is it only being on weekends set in stone?

replies.body: OCE is pretty small, and having it on the weekend only is probably the best possible solution, as a majority of people can only play on the weekends and if you did it all throughout the week, people would get bored of it :<

Sir, the fact I have played the same map roughly 1800 times, over 4 years, affirms the inherent retardation of your statement.

I work 12:30 hours on Friday, Saturday, Sunday, with an hour commute both ways. If I want to get my 8 hours that leaves me 1 hour to catch up with family, eat, bathe, get ready for bed. Having this weekends only is pure BS. I'm glad some people will get to play breaking this once a year BS at least but I wish I could play too. Thanks for the arbitrary exclusion Riot.
